column4: Samba won't start - "user guest in passdb, but getpwnam() fails!" and "error: failed to setup guest info" in log. Have removed and reinstalled many times (and removed smb.conf). any ideas?
(this is a wild guess), try 'sudo smbpasswd -a guest' to set up an entry in samba's password db
hmmk, sorry nothing else springs to mind :|
